title: S- on a lvl 5 Mastery Champion But no Lvl 6 Token?
body:
I earned an S- in a game 12/0/18 as Lux, Yet I receive no lvl 6 token not even a chest or anything. 
Can you please tell me why? Considering the requirements for a lvl 6 mastery token is : Acquired by grading S- or above on a level 5 Mastery Champion.....
This has taken me a while to get considering I don't LoL extremely often..... []
(http://file:///C:/Users/Nicholas/Pictures/Screenshots/Screenshot%20(18).png)

replies.body: You'll have to upload the image to a site like imgur.com for us to see it here. Without looking at it I can't really tell you much, but have you tried checking in your actual loot tab? The new client isn't super reliable with the mastery popups atm.
